      • closeStartedProjects

        public void closeStartedProjects()
        This method closes the project that has already started (i.e. the projects that satisfy the condition CalendarUtility.before(now, aStartDate) && CalendarUtility.after(now, aEndDate) where 'now' is the EntityUtility.getServerTimestamp(), 'aStartDate' is the project.getStartDate() and 'aEndDate' is the project getEndDate() method.
        Specified by:
        closeStartedProjects in interface TeamManagerLocal
